tossup_question: -   –   Which of the following is NOT true regarding semiconductors?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Doping is used to modulate the electrical properties of a semiconductor
X) Silica glass is a semiconductor
Y) Silicon is the most commonly used semiconductor in electronics
Z) Light emitting diodes can be made of semiconductors
tossup_answer: ANSWER: X) SILICA GLASS IS A SEMICONDUCTOR
bonus_question: -   –  A 50 gram ball moving to the right at 4 meters per second overtakes and collides perfectly elastically with a 100 gram ball moving to the right at 2 meters per second. Which of the following is true after the collision?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Both balls are moving to the left at 1.33 meters per second and 3.33 meters per second, respectively
X) Both balls are moving to the right at 1.33 meters per second and 3.33 meters per second, respectively
Y) Both balls are moving to the left at 1.66 and 3.00 meters per second, respectively
Z) Both balls are moving to the right at 1.66 and 3.00 meters per second, respectively
bonus_answer: ANSWER: X) BOTH BALLS ARE MOVING TO THE RIGHT AT 1.33 AND 3.33 METERS PER SECOND, RESPECTIVELY
